gui.All-webapps-hint:
In the section below you see a list of web applications. They are in alphabetic order grouped by the status (erros and warnings first).
Click on the labeltext to see details.
You can filter the view by typing in the freetext filter field or clicking a label.
gui.Setup-add-client-pretext: Enter an Appmonitor client url to add a new monitor:
gui.About-text:
This is OpenSource software
License: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0
University of Bern :: IML - Institute of Medical Education.

The client component makes checks and creates a status file in JSON syntax.
The server component fetches the health status information data from (all your) application servers and renders a total view and sends notifications to the related teams.
gui.About-projecturl: The project is public for all and located at %s.
gui.About-docs: The Documentation is available as markdown. You can read it online on the project url or as readme.md in the downloaded archive.
gui.Chart-graph-description: Last response times of the monitoring request beginning with connect time up to finish of the transfer.
gui.Http-details: Http details of the last app monitor request
gui.Preview-of-messages: Preview of messages to send (Debug is enabled)
gui.Preview-replacements: Replacements: placeholder and its current texts
gui.btn-deleteUrl-confirm:
Are you sure that you want to delete the url

%s

?
gui.msgErr-nocheck-welcome:
Welcome to the Appmonitor Server Webgui!

At the moment it looks very naked because no check was defined yet.
To add an url to check go to the Setup.
gui.msgErr-demosite: This is a demo website. Changing the config is not possible here.
gui.msgErr-Http-request-failed: Http Request to the appmonitor check failed: host or service is unreachable.
gui.msgErr-Http-error: The response contains an error code: the Http status code is not a 2xx.
gui.msgErr-Http-no-jsondata: The Appmonitor client sent a response but this is no JSON.
gui.msgErr-Http-outdated: The information about the application is out of date.
gui.msgErr-Url-not-added-no-appmonitor:
URL not added: %s
it does not seems to be an Appmonitor url - no JSON data was found.
Http response header: %s
gui.msgErr-Url-not-removed-it-does-not-exist: URL cannot be removed - it doees not exist in the config: %s.
gui.msgErr-missing-section-checks: There is no section "checks" in the response. This can be the result of a timeout or an error.
gui.msgErr-missing-key-checks-name: checks > %s > name is not set - this check has no identifier.
gui.msgErr-missing-key-checks-result: checks > %s > result is not set - this check has no result.
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-checks-description: checks > %s > description is not set - this check has no description about its action/ reason.
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-checks-value: checks > %s > value is not set - the result of this check has no explaination of its result.
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-checks-time: checks > %s > time is not set - the check has no measurement data. This is just a hint: measuring data are optional.
gui.msgErr-missing-section-meta: There is no section "meta" in the response (request failed?).
gui.msgErr-missing-key-meta-host: No hostname was set in meta > host
gui.msgErr-missing-key-meta-website: No website / name of application was set meta > website
gui.msgErr-missing-key-meta-result: The check does not have a result in meta > result
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-meta-ttl: No ttl value was set with meta > ttl. Using the default.
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-meta-notifications: No section meta > notifications was set. If an error occurs no notification will be sent to developers or product owners.
gui.msgWarn-no-notifications: In the section meta > notification > [target] is no notifier. If an error occurs no notification will be sent to developers or product owners.
gui.msgWarn-missing-key-meta-time: No measurement - no value was set with meta > time.
gui.zzz_lastentry: This is just a Dummy entry without comma at the end of line

notifications.changetype-0.email.subject: Webapp has no change: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-1.logmessage: Webapp was added to the Appmonitor: __URL__. __ERROR__
notifications.changetype-1.email.subject: [Appmonitor] :: webapp was added: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-1.email.message:
Welcome! The webapp __URL__ was added in the Appmonitor. From now on you will get notifications if the status changes.

url: __MONITORURL__

__CHECKS__
notifications.changetype-2.logmessage: Status of __URL__ has changed from __LAST-RESULT__ to __RESULT__. __ERROR__
notifications.changetype-2.email.subject: [Appmonitor] :: __CHANGE__ __LAST-RESULT__ --> __RESULT__ - __URL__
notifications.changetype-2.email.message:
__TIME__
__WEBSITE__ @ __HOST__
Status has changed from __LAST-RESULT__ to __RESULT__.

see current status on: __MONITORURL__

__CHECKS__
notifications.changetype-3.email.subject: [Appmonitor] :: webapp was DELETED: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-3.email.message:
__TIME__
The webapp __URL__ was deleted in the Appmonitor. You will not get notifications about status changes anymore. If this is an error, then contact the sysadmin.
notifications.email.subject: __CHANGE__ __LAST-RESULT__ --> __RESULT__ :: App monitor __URL__.
notifications.msgErr-missing-section-checks: There is no section "checks" in the response. This can be the result of a timeout or an error.
notifications.zzz_lastentry: This is just a Dummy entry without comma at the end of line

zzz_lastentry: This is just a Dummy entry without comma at the end of line
